value.stringValue: Create a new IMLS Request and identify the documents required
Search for an existing IMLS Request by A-File #

Flow.description: This flow creates a case for the eWRTS case creation process.
Flow.label: USCIS eWRTS Case Creation Flow

value.stringValue: New case requested by {!Get_Contact.Name} for {!A_File}. Organization is {!Get_Contact.Account.Name}.
Based on the A-Number entered the following results were found.
A_Number__c:127, Date_Opened__c:209, CaseNumber:129, AccountId:460, ContactId:383, Origin:268, Status:480
Skip Access Request - Create a New Request
Based on the A-Number entered the following results were found.

fields.name: DisplayTextNoANumber
fields.fieldText:
A NUMBER {!A_File} - NOT FOUND.


We were unable to find requests for the A Number ({!A_File}) you entered.


You may continue to the creating the eWRTS request for {!A_File} if you like or use the previous button to enter a new A Number.

value.stringValue: Please review your requested documents for your eWRTS request

fields.name: Placeholder_0_0
fields.fieldText: Please review the fields below prior to submitting your request. If you need to make any changes please use the Previous button to return to the prior screen.

fields.name: DocumentsRequested_0
fields.fieldText: You have identified the documents needed as part of your request as the following:

fields.name: Other_Form_Specify_in_the_field_below_0
fields.fieldText: Other Form (Specify in the field below)

fields.name: SuccessText
fields.fieldText:
SUCCESS!!!


Thank you for submitting a case for A-Number {!A_File}. Your case has been routed accordingly.


You may check the status of your case in My Cases View on our self-service portal.

value.stringValue: Request your documents for your IMLS request

fields.name: Placeholder_0
fields.fieldText: Please complete the fields below to submit your request. Your request cannot be submitted until the Case Reason and documents requested are identified.

fields.name: DocumentsRequested
fields.fieldText: Please identify the documents needed as part of your request

fields.name: Other_Form_Specify_in_the_field_below
fields.fieldText: Other Form (Specify in the field below)

value.stringValue: Use this process to guide you in creating an eWRTS case.

fields.name: InformationText
fields.fieldText:
In order to help get the process started please ensure you have the Alien File Number (AFN) available for your request.


Please enter the AFN below to get started.

value.stringValue: Make a selection to start your IMLS journey
